articles.title: Kevin Costner Can’t Hold Back Tears as His Western Epic ‘Horizon’ Earns 7-Minute Cannes Standing Ovation, Promises ‘3 More’ Installments - Variety
articles.description: Kevin Costner's ambitious and expensive 'Horizon: An American Saga' premiered at Cannes on Sunday night, earning a 7-minute standing ovation.
articles.content:
“Horizon: An American Saga,” Kevin Costner‘s risk-it-all Western epic, rode into Cannes on Sunday, earning a seven-minute standing ovation.
